channel.title: Posts on Kevin Jia

item.title: Python blog post
item.description: Most of my Python skills were developed through various other classes I have taken through the elements of computing certificate. Some of these classes include data structures, software engineering, databases, and web programming. However I did pickup a few new skills from this class, including exposure to pandas and other Python libraries, and learning how to have R and python talk to each other with reticulate. I learned that to look at datasets in Python, you must import pandas, a software library that is used for data manipulation and analysis.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
